column3: Okay, so my friends, today we will be playing a matching game.

And he specifically wants to guess.

But only one of you friends will see a picture in a black box.
And Smurphy wants to guess that picture in the black box.
So let's say [id26], you'll have Smurphy, right?
If you have Smurphy, you will help Smurphy guess which picture is in the black box.
But if [id25], you don't have Smurphy, you will tell [id26] and Smurphy what you see in the black box.
So that they can make the right choice.
Will you be the guesser or will you be the teller?

You will be the teller because you will tell Smurphy and [id26] what you see in the black box.

Now, on the screen, you will see an image.
If you see a smiley face, a happy face, then great.
It was a match and you found the picture that was in the black box.
If you see a sad face, it wasn't a match, but it's completely okay and we will move on to the next round.
